games.1: pair; one pair of equal ranks within five cards
games.2: two_pairs; two pairs of equal ranks within five cards
games.3: three_kind; three equal ranks within five cards
games.4: straight; five cards, sequentially ranked with no gaps
games.5: flush; five cards with the same suit
games.6: full_house; pair + different rank three of a kind
games.7: four_kind; four equal ranks within five cards
games.9: royal_flush; {Ace, King, Queen, Jack, Ten} + flush
